page.title: 03 EDUCATION (cont)
page.content: "A"are expected to get 10 O'levels and 3 A'levels.Class "E"are expected to get a minimum of 5 O'levels and up to 2 A' levels.They have an 80% O'level pass rate,and a 60% university entrance, these figures are considered good by anybodys standard. The day boys attending Highgate have to pay $700 per term.Boarders have to pay $1,600 per term.The fees cover everything apart from text books. One pupil said that after attending a sate school and finding it unsatisfactory he started to attend Highgate.He has been attending Highgate for seven years and is expecting to obtain 10 O'levels and hopes to follow a career in Law. The boys felt that access to computers was fairly limited.The boys are not taught domestic subjects and if they did the would rather resent it.
